data.expected_result: The 100 char limit should go away once either (a) you go under 100 chars (b) you click save changes
data.short_description: Over 100 char limit does go away once gone under
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Server Settings - Make the server name over 100 characters - Try click save button (limit error should come) - Make the name smaller that 100 chars - Click Save Changes
